title: Episode #9: Wayne Levine and BetterMen.org
description: Welcome back to another edition of The Art of Manliness podcast! In this episode we talk to Wayne Levine. Wayne is the founder of BetterMen.org where he offers mentoring for men and facilitates men's retreats and groups. He's the author of the book, Hold on To Your N.U.Ts: The Relationship Manual for Men. You can find out more about Wayne's work by visiting bettermen.org.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
